creditline: Purchased with funds donated by Edward A. Studzinski
description: pot constructed of thick, irregular coils with horizontal indentations; small base flaring outward and upward; orange at bottom exterior; body is blue-green with milky white areas
markings: on bottom, stamped: [KD.2 / 2012]; along bottom edge, stamped: [\'12]; on bottom and along bottom edge: artist\'s stamp; on bottom, on sticker: [7504]
signed: on bottom and along bottom edge, incised: [Hoshino]; see Mark
title: Spring Snow 12-7
